commit.message:
Fix the Alpha/VMS build. Installed as obvious.

	* config/alpha/alpha.c (alpha_need_linkage): Adjust
	splay_tree_new_gcc_call.
	(alpha_use_linkage): Likewise.

From-SVN: r161437

files.patch:

+	splay_tree_new_gcc_call.
+	(alpha_use_linkage): Likewise.
